page.title: 16GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: GAMES CHILDREN PLAY. In the playground at school most of the games children play are variations of the game where one child is "It"and the others try not to be caught. In {MOB}"It"counts to 20while others hide.They then run to touch a chosen post before"It" does.If"It"touches the post,he/she says 1,2,3,MOB,and a child's name when he sees someone.The last one can say"Save All!" In{STICKY NICKY }you stand like a statue if"It" touches you.You become unstuck if someone else touches you. {STUCK IN THE MUD}means you stand star shaped when caught.If someone goes under your legs you are free. {LAZY BIRD},{KANGEROO HOPS },{ {CHOCOLATE},{GRANDMOTHER'S FOOTSTEPS},{ {DRAINPIPE},{WHAT'S THE TIME MR.WOLF} are also popular. { }
